attributes.action: Abolish Golden Handshakes when an MP leaves parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These payments are a disgrace especially in light of the fact that MPs get a golden pension where they can draw a lump sum. An MP regardless of whether he/she does a good job is entitled to this payment. Ordinary people don't get these payments, why should MPs?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
